dcterms:description: A large-scale dataset for speaker verification containing audio samples from various speakers, designed to facilitate research in voice recognition and verification.
dcterms:title: All English Dataset

dcterms:creator: Hareesh Mandalapu
Raghavendra Ramachandra
Christoph Busch
dcterms:description: A multilingual voice impersonation dataset that includes audio samples in both Arabic and English, aimed at evaluating voice impersonation technologies.
dcterms:title: Mixed Dataset (Arabic plus English)

dcterms:creator: Joseph P Campbell
dcterms:description: A database designed for automatic speaker verification systems, containing recordings of various speakers for research and development purposes.
dcterms:title: YOHO Database
